roleset.name: act in responce to a stimulus

example.name: arg 1
example.text: The counter - reaction of Libyan pressure on some areas of the Arab world .

propbank.arg: of Libyan pressure on some areas of the Arab world

example.name: arg 2 - likely rare
example.text: Boredom during the week and the counter - reaction of too much action over the weekends .

propbank.arg: of too much action over the weekends

roleset.note: COUNTERREACTION-N NOTES: Based on Arabic sentences. Comparison with react.01 and counteract.01. Framed by Katie. (from counterreaction.01-n)
